data.text: @AirTalk As a parent of 2 elementary school kids in LAUSD, I believe it's premature to remove masking indoors and weekly testing for that matter. We only have 26% of 5-11 yo vaccinated in LAC & no option for the 0-4 year olds. Protect our kids and our teachers along w/ families.
We are switching gears to our next COVID-19 segment!

@AirTalk what we need to do going forward to try avoid more variants  being introduced to this county is to keep people from China and South Africa from traveling to this country on an open ended basis.

@AirTalk Mike from Altadena:?/ clarification,  The Doctor has said that deaths from covid are completely avoidable by just getting vaccinated, so does that mean nobody, that has been vaccinated, have died from Covid?

Dr.Kimberly Shriner: I will always wear a mask when I go into a supermarket.. because it protects me from infectious diseases and what I may be carrying [since I work in a hospital]...it should be a part of our wardrobe.

Dr.Kimberly Shriner on the effectiveness of surgical masks: They are, masking is dependent on how much virus is in the community and your risk level... we didn't want to use that during our previous surge since there was so much virus circulating but they do serve a purpose.
Dr. Kimberly Shriner: It would be highly unlikely that we don't have another variant emerge...hopefully it isn't as nasty as previous ones.

We'll now be answering your COVID-19 questions.

Join us https://t.co/K1mBUI8MBm
